title: Sidewall, 1800–10
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Square of paper showing two motifs of a large-scale geometric pattern. One motif in orange, circular, with repeating blue-black cone shapes, a white design at center and blue-black radial surround. The other motif diamond-shaped.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1800–10.
1800–10. Block-printed, handmade paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-45-42.
